siteSettings.title: Site Settings
siteSettings.description: Manage your website settings and configuration

setup.dnsDescription: Point your domain to our servers by adding a CNAME record:

general.logoDescription: Logo to be displayed on your website. Recommended size: 200x60 pixels
general.faviconDescription: Icon to be displayed in browser tab. Recommended size: 32x32 pixels
general.activeLanguagesDescription: Select languages that will be available on your website
general.languagesDescription: Select languages that will be available on your website
general.translateTooltip: Translate content from selected language to all other active languages (AI powered)
general.maintenanceDescription: When enabled, visitors will see a maintenance page
general.maintenanceMessagePlaceholder: We are currently performing scheduled maintenance...
general.siteDescriptionPlaceholder: Best travel services for hotels, tours and transfers...

homepage.sliderDescription: Manage slider images displayed on the homepage
homepage.deleteSliderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this slider?
homepage.noSliders: No slider items yet. Add your first slider.

pricing.title: B2B Pricing Settings
pricing.description: Set default pricing model and settings for this hotel
pricing.netPriceDesc: Hotel provides net price, partner adds markup
pricing.rackRateDesc: Hotel provides retail price, partner gets commission
pricing.netPriceExample: Example: Hotel gives 100€ net → Partner adds 20% markup → Sells to agency at 120€
pricing.rackRateExample: Example: Hotel gives 150€ rack → Partner takes 15% commission → Costs 127.50€

basic.title: Basic Information

basic.featuredHelp: Featured hotels are highlighted on the website

markets.title: Markets
markets.codeHint: Use a short and descriptive code
markets.name: Market Name
markets.catchAllHint: All countries not assigned to other markets will be included in this market
markets.isDefaultHint: Countries not in other markets will be included in this market
markets.emptyHint: Use the Add Market button to create a new market
markets.countriesInfo: Select the countries to include in this market. Customers from selected countries will see this market's prices and currency.
markets.countriesHint: If no countries are selected, this market will be open to all countries (behaves like a default market)
markets.b2cDescription: Direct sales to end users (via website)
markets.b2cMarkupHint: Profit margin to add to end user prices
markets.prepaymentDescription: Requires prepayment at the time of booking
markets.paymentDueDaysDescription: Number of days allowed for balance payment
markets.remainingPaymentHint: Specify when the remaining {percent}% should be paid
markets.daysAfterBookingHint: Payment is due a specified number of days after booking date
markets.daysBeforeCheckinHint: Payment is due a specified number of days before check-in
markets.atCheckinHint: Remaining balance is paid at the hotel upon check-in
markets.fullPaymentAtBookingHint: Entire payment is collected at the time of booking
markets.statusActiveHint: This market is open for sales and visible to customers
markets.statusInactiveHint: This market is currently closed for sales
markets.ageSettingsHint: Define custom child and infant age ranges for this market.
markets.ageSettingsDisabledHint: Age settings disabled. No custom age range will be defined for this market.
markets.nonRefundableHint: Offer customers a discounted non-refundable rate option
markets.useHotelPolicyHint: Use hotel's general cancellation policy for this market
markets.activeProductsHint: Define which room and meal types are available for sale in this market. Leave empty for all.
markets.emptyMeansAll: Leave empty for all to be active
markets.childrenAllowedHint: Accept reservations with children in this market?

seasons.productOverrideHint: Season-specific room and meal type restrictions. Leave empty to inherit from market.
seasons.emptyInheritsMarket: Leave empty to inherit from market settings
seasons.childrenAllowedHint: Customize children acceptance for this season

campaigns.title: Campaigns
campaigns.name: Campaign Name
campaigns.selectAtLeastOneMarket: You must select at least one market
campaigns.bookingWindowHint: When can customers see this promotion?
campaigns.stayWindowHint: When can guests use the discounted rate?
campaigns.emptyHint: Use the Add Campaign button to create a new campaign
campaigns.combinable: Can be combined with other campaigns
campaigns.combinableHint: If selected, this campaign can be applied together with other campaigns
campaigns.calculationTypeCumulativeHint: All discounts calculated on original price
campaigns.calculationTypeSequentialHint: Each discount calculated on previous discounted price
campaigns.applicationTypeStayHint: Discount only applies to nights within campaign period
campaigns.applicationTypeCheckinHint: If check-in is within campaign period, discount applies to all nights
campaigns.selectAtLeastOneMealPlan: You must select at least one meal plan
campaigns.selectAtLeastOneRoomType: You must select at least one room type

pricing.description: Manage room rates, seasons and allotments

pricing.datesOutsideSeason: Selected dates are outside the season date range
pricing.noSeasonForDates: Selected dates are not within any season. Please select a date range within season dates.

pricing.step2Desc: Set room price and extra person charges

pricing.selectRoomTypeHint: Select a room type above to view the price list
pricing.selectFiltersFirst: Select room type and meal plan
pricing.selectFiltersHint: Select both room type and meal plan above to view the price list
pricing.extraPersonHint: Additional nightly charge applies for each guest beyond standard capacity
pricing.singleOccupancyHint: Discount applied when only one guest stays
pricing.allotmentHint: Number of rooms available for this period
pricing.releaseDaysHint: Days before arrival when sales close
pricing.mealPlanPricingHint: Rates won't be created for meal plans without pricing

ageSourceTooltip.hotel: Age range is from hotel settings
ageSourceTooltip.market: Age range is from market settings
ageSourceTooltip.season: Age range is from season settings
